summary: A comprehensive test suite for the contraception component of a health simulation framework, containing utility helpers and a variety of test cases that verify contraceptive method distribution, switching, defaulting behavior, appointment tracking, birth outcomes, and interactions with the health system and consumable availability.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the accuracy of reproductive health modeling within the simulation, enabling reliable policy analysis and decisionâ€‘making regarding family planning services, resource allocation, and health system performance.
